showerReviews.reviewText: … Almost no one takes a shower before swimming. Although a sign with such a requirement hangs in front of the entrance to the pool. I don't understand, is it ignorance, lack of culture, or careless attitude towards themselves and others? Even …

I swam laps there tonight for the first time. It is a nice facility. The shower and locker rooms AR not being used right now due to Colvin.
$3 per 2 hrs swimming ... pool well maintained. Hot shower n children park available.

locations.title: Mary T Meagher Aquatic Center
locations.street: 201 Reservoir AveIndoor pool with swim & fitness classes "... no one uses the locker room
locations.city: and they undress right by the pool."
locations.content: Mary T Meagher Aquatic Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: … Almost no one takes a shower before swimming. Although a sign with such a requirement hangs in front of the entrance to the pool. I don't understand, is it ignorance, lack of culture, or careless attitude towards themselves and others? Even …
Great classes. My 6 year old is enjoying the swimming lessons. Pool water is cooler than some other places. Bring your own shower gel.
I swam laps there tonight for the first time. It is a nice facility. The shower and locker rooms AR not being used right now due to Colvin.
$3 per 2 hrs swimming ... pool well maintained. Hot shower n children park available.
